name: Avoid using Global Variables
description: Global Variables should not be used.
output: This report lists all uses of Global Variables.
rationale: The key disadvantages of using Global Variables are: Side effects - Hidden access - for example when a local variable has the same name as the global variable. Indiscriminate access - it is impossible to prevent access to the variable, therefore is may be difficult to make changes in the future.
remediation: Use parameters in functions and subs.

technicalCriteria.name: Programming Practices - Modularity and OO Encapsulation Conformity
